abstract: Toyota is moving to resolve last major legal issues related to unintended acceleration of its vehicles, which has already cost company billions of dollars and prompted recall of millions of cars in 2009 and 2010.

byline.original: By JACLYN TROP and BEN PROTESS

lead_paragraph: In one case, Toyota is nearing a deal with the Justice Department to settle a criminal investigation over the way the automaker disclosed complaints stemming from the sudden acceleration of its vehicles, according to two people with knowledge of the talks.

headline.main: Toyota in Talks on Final Settlements Over Car Recalls
